info.description: API for brackets, matchups, voting, and engagement
info.title: Matchup API

delete.description: Delete a bracket comment (owner or admin)
Detach a matchup from a bracket
Delete a bracket owned by the authenticated user

post.description: Advance a bracket to the next round
Add a comment to a bracket
Like a bracket as the authenticated user

delete.description: Remove the authenticated user's like from a bracket

post.description: Attach a matchup to a bracket round

get.description: Get bracket, matchups, and viewer-specific likes
Get popular matchups, popular brackets, and total engagements

patch.description: Cast or switch a vote for a matchup item

put.description: Update a matchup's title or content

delete.description: Delete a matchup owned by the authenticated user

post.description: Add a comment to a matchup
Finalize a matchup and lock voting
Add a new item to a matchup
Like a matchup as the authenticated user

delete.description: Remove the authenticated user's like from a matchup

post.description: Select the winner for a matchup
Internal: resolve a tie and advance the bracket
Reset password using a valid token

get.description: Get bracket likes for a user
Get all brackets created by a user

post.description: Create a new bracket with optional seeded entries

get.description: Get likes made by a user
Get votes made by a user
Get paginated matchups for a user

post.description: Create a new matchup for the authenticated user

get.description: Get a matchup owned by a user

BearerAuth.description: Provide a valid JWT as: Bearer <token>
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
